title: Browns Bridge
text: The Browns Bridge is a <a href="cantilever%20bridge">cantilever bridge</a> in <a href="Georgia%20%28U.S.%20state%29">Georgia (U.S. state)</a> carrying <a href="Georgia%20State%20Route%20369">Georgia State Route 369 (Browns Bridge Road)</a> across the <a href="Lake%20Sidney%20Lanier">Chattahoochee River / Lake Sidney Lanier</a> between <a href="Gainesville%2C%20Georgia">Gainesville</a> and <a href="Cumming%2C%20Georgia">Cumming</a>. It is just 35 miles northeast of <a href="Atlanta">Atlanta</a>. As of 2018, a new bridge is being built adjacent to and just South of the existing bridge.
